title: NEW Razer Blade Stealth 13 - SUPERCHARGED!
description: The new Razer Blade Stealth 13 ultrabooks are here and we're excited! These thin machines are getting equipped with Intel's 10th-gen CPUs and Nvidia's GTX 1650 GPUs for maximum performance in this form factor. Subscribe for our full performance analysis in the near future!   Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below: Pure 12 ARGB Fans:   Pure 14 ARGB Fans:   Pure 20 ARGB Fan:   Level 20 VT Case:   ARGB Memory Cover:   Water 3.0 240mm ARGB AIO:   Water 3.0 360mm ARGB AIO:    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Thermaltake. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #razerbladestealth13 #bestgaminglaptop2019 #hardwarecanucks
